subject: Your loan is pre-approved  Mon, 30 Apr 2007 21:13:42 -0800
body:
Dear Home-0wner

Would you like to reduce your mortgage payment?. You loan has been pre-approved.

You can receive $262,000 for 
$595 per month.

Please respond A.S.A.P.
http://ilook.tw/g8ah

 


Burt Cusack
Loan Approval Dept


Life is the art of drawing sufficient conclusions from insufficient premises.	Samuel Butler (1612-1680)
